section.title: 启动与终止容器
section.screen: $ sudo docker run ubuntu:14.10 /bin/echo 'Hello world' Hello world

sudo docker start silly_bohr silly_bohr
$ sudo docker stop silly_bohr silly_bohr
$ sudo docker restart silly_bohr silly_bohr
$ sudo docker run -d ubuntu:14.10 /bin/sh -c "while true; do echo hello world; sleep 1; done" 4cdbb75eeabf3f1ea87bec91accdf5211639d0895e94ab94ffa1d55fb7f62e2a
section.para: 通过 docker ps 命令来查看容器信息
section.screen: $ sudo docker ps CONTAINER ID IMAGE COMMAND CREATED STATUS PORTS NAMES 4cdbb75eeabf ubuntu:14.10 "/bin/sh -c 'while t 30 seconds ago Up 28 seconds drunk_rosalind
section.para: 要获取容器的输出信息，可以通过 docker logs 命令。
注意：守护进程在后台运行，所以无输出，只能通过docker logs 命令查看

section.title: 进入容器
section.screen:
$ sudo docker run -idt ubuntu:14.10 793f9805620d7e10564e0778c388640cb73b6a1aec663bf468904d72a4f219f2
$ sudo docker ps CONTAINER ID IMAGE COMMAND CREATED STATUS PORTS NAMES 793f9805620d ubuntu:14.10 "/bin/bash" 5 seconds ago Up 4 seconds mad_elion
$ sudo docker attach mad_elion root@793f9805620d:/# ls bin boot dev etc home lib lib64 media mnt opt proc root run sbin srv sys tmp usr var

section.title: 删除容器
section.para: 使用 docker rm 来删除一个处于终止状态的容器。
section.screen:
$ sudo docker ps -a CONTAINER ID IMAGE COMMAND CREATED STATUS PORTS NAMES f8c7b2afff14 ubuntu:14.10 "/bin/bash" 14 minutes ago Exited (0) 2 minutes ago agitated_fermat 0abd2e5fc251 ubuntu:14.10 "/bin/echo 'Hello wo 15 minutes ago Exited (0) 15 minutes ago clever_kowalevski
$ sudo docker rm clever_kowalevski clever_kowalevski
$ sudo docker ps -a CONTAINER ID IMAGE COMMAND CREATED STATUS PORTS NAMES f8c7b2afff14 ubuntu:14.10 "/bin/bash" 16 minutes ago Exited (0) 5 minutes ago agitated_fermat
section.para: 删除所有已经停止的容器
